Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options

Class PubOptionWithValue<V extends PubOptionWithValue<V>>

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options.PubOption
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options.PubOptionWithValue<V>
Type Parameters:
V - Inherited class of PubOptionWithValue.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PubDirectoryOption, PubExecutableOption, PubGitPathOption, PubGitRefOption, PubGitUrlOption, PubHostedUrlOption, PubPackageOption, PubPathOption, PubSdkOption, PubStyleOption, PubTokenSubCommand.TokenVarOption, PubVerbosityOption, PubVersionOption
public abstract non-sealed class PubOptionWithValue<V extends PubOptionWithValue<V>> extends PubOption
A PubOption parsed with given value.
The value must be a String without new line control charter (\n or \r). If the value contains whitespace charter, entire String must be quoted when parsing option value.
Since:
1.0.0
